# Console backend

---

## Development

### 로컬 실행 commands:

#### 환경 변수
```sh
--user-auth-oidc-issuer-url=http://localhost:8080
--user-auth=cocktail
--k8s-mode=off-cluster
--k8s-mode-off-cluster-endpoint=https://101.55.69.162:6443
--k8s-mode-off-cluster-skip-verify-tls=true
--k8s-auth-bearer-token="eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6IkxzZWE1anBhZmNLdW9saUVmaXo3OE5KcFZiS282UWUtV1hSaUFXWFNOTUUifQ..mZkFVSwZOvsEyLxhH4o8MIbLKAqsRfdsDUun7euCz-c8S9N1gZ51mwmyJaR1QLkbaZ7aCRG8gq4WrGHPRanGJH9t9yq9YNIRhmEjmYPqM9cnWUEdFTV-kzPCUxcLGVylZ42eHI3XGeV_z5_5H7myQCCiE-QbAjftGNl80mJa8xF8ArkoI_kDQWDhNYiGdcSeRHIZc4jtJX8fp8OpTqwRd3Ylwln0YTaa_5XMp7dolIv_jJUNSKaCj2Uqz74GN_8ubfv7XdaW72nDN40C4x_UPYgcOfSC1zqk1WqMNKxdDzC4bpu_Ae9sOFqHnItlHzejJUN34ViKDqn1ujMJa3au2A"
```
